title: Insane Rubberbanding
body: I was in a game, and I was just teleporting from left, to right. Any time I did anything, I just teleported and it took like 5 seconds. I have no idea what's the problem since I have 150-200 FPS and 40 ping.

replies.body: I've seen a few reports from players during this time of post who were experiencing some ISP issues.  More specifically, it looks like a lot of Comcast users in the NJ/PA areas were having connection issues.  Is this the case for you, and if so is everything okay now?
I'd love to switch to another ISP but I don't have coverage from other reliable providers in my area. Comcast is evil and wants to end Net Neutrality. That's all I wanted to say.
just saw this today. yeah the problem was gone by the next day I kinda felt it was comcast (PA area)
Yeah I have Comcast, and live in PA. I think it might be better because the log-in time was super fast. I'll give it a try soon.
Same thing happened to me about an hour ago and now the client won't even load.
Yeah, my client wouldn't load too. Now it loads, but it takes such a long time to log in. Idk whats the issue...................

I initially had that issue where it would load super slowly and take forever to login, but after I restarted it again, it has become quite literally just a black screen that I cannot interact with at all.
Wtf. thats super weird!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! no idea what to do. im probably not going to play another game because I dont want to afk again
same thing just happened to me, do you have comcast? might be that shit-tier company
Yeah I have comcast. It might be comcast. Anything we can do?
